title: Israelis
summary: Israelis (Hebrew: ישראלים‎, romanized: Yiśraʾelim, Arabic: الإسرائيليين‎, romanized: al-ʾIsrāʾīliyyin) are the citizens and nationals of the State of Israel. Notably multicultural and populated by people of different ethnic backgrounds, Israel's populace is composed primarily of Jews and Arabs, who respectively account for 75 percent and 20 percent of the national population, followed by other minorities who account for 5 percent of the country's population.[18]
